_comment: JIRA backend configuration - REQUIRED fields marked with TODO
_user_comment: Leave empty to use environment variables (JIRA_USER) or prompt at runtime
_field_mappings_comment: Auto-discovered on first use. You can manually set field IDs if needed. Example: {'acceptance_criteria': {'id': 'customfield_12345', 'required_for': ['Story', 'Epic']}}
_parent_field_mapping_comment: Maps issue types to parent field names. Example: {'story': 'epic_link', 'task': 'epic_link', 'sub-task': 'parent'}

on_start._from_comment: TODO: Customize statuses that trigger transition when starting work
on_start._to_comment: TODO: Set the target status when starting work (e.g., 'In Progress'), or leave empty to prompt
on_start._prompt_comment: If true, prompts for status selection instead of auto-transitioning
on_start._on_fail_comment: Action on transition failure: 'warn' (show warning) or 'error' (stop execution)

on_complete._from_comment: TODO: Customize statuses that trigger transition when completing work
on_complete._to_comment: TODO: Set the target status when completing work (e.g., 'Review', 'Done'), or leave empty to prompt
on_complete._prompt_comment: If true, prompts for status selection instead of auto-transitioning
